creator: dan@redknee.com
text:
I was wondering if we could create an accessor for this variable so extensions 
created under other package hierarchies implementing their own Category 
derivation could access it to do level comparisons similar to the default 
Category. 

I believe it was accessable publically in an earlier release although I may be 
mistaken. It becomes beneficial when you want to derive your own Priority and 
add additional methods in a Category as in MyCategory.alarm(snmpMessage).

Thanks,
Dan MacDonald
dan@redknee.com

creator: ceki@apache.org
text: The getThreshold method (in log4j 1.2) should do what you want.
